article_title: Halperin: Hillary's 'Clinton Cash' Fact-Check Video 'Misdirection, Cherry Picking'
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Tuesday, Bloomberg Politics’ Mark Halperin fact-checked Hillary Clinton’s campaign website’s “Clinton Cash” fact-check video.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Halperin mocked Clinton campaign press secretary Brian Fallon’s video as having “lots of cherry picking” and “misdirection.”

Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
